document.full_text: fighters loyal to ivory coast presidential rivals laurent gbagbo and alassane ouattara held onto positions around the main city abidjan on sunday, a day that saw less fighting than the previous three.
document.title: ivory coast calm as rivals hold positions
lines_and_colors: fighters loyal to ivory coast presidential rivals laurent gbagbo and alassane ouattara held onto positions around the main city abidjan on sunday, a day that saw less fighting than the previous three.
